content: *roar into school with one of our 13 free pencil case patterns featuring a whole menagerie of adorable animals * whether your little monkey loves tigers polar bears or kitty cats we ve got the perfect critter for their school supplies so grab your hooks your scheepjes catona stash and let s bring these animal characters designed by nienke jongstra to life **materials** **scheepjes catona** 100% mercerised cotton * 2 5mm crochet hook stitch marker polyester stuffing 20cm closed-end zipper* pair of 6mm round 8mm round or 9mm oval black safety eyes* sewing thread* **see individual patterns for colour of sewing thread zip and yarn required the yarn amounts and eye size *
